---
title: Tibialis Posterior Muscle

---

# OIAN

:::{layout-ncol="2"}
### Origin

- Interosseous membrane @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020
- Adjacent borders of tibia and fibula @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

### Insertion

- Navicular tuberosity
- Cuneiforms (medial, intermediate, and lateral)
- 2nd to 4th metatarsals (bases) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

### Nerve
Tibial n. (L4, L5)

### Action

- Talocrural joint: plantar flexion
- Subtalar joint: inversion (supination)
- Supports the longitudinal and transverse arches @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

:::
